name: Location

methods.name: getDistance
methods.signature: public Double getDistance(Location toLocation, String unit)
methods.description: Calculates the distance between this location and the specified location, using an approximation of the haversine formula and the specified unit.

params.name: unit
params.description: The Location to which you want to calculate the distance from the current Location. The distance unit you want to use: mi or km.

methods.name: getDistance
methods.signature: public static Double getDistance(Location firstLocation, Location secondLocation, String unit)
methods.description: Calculates the distance between the two specified locations, using an approximation of the haversine formula and the specified unit.

params.name: unit
params.description: The first of two locations used to calculate distance. The second of two locations used to calculate distance. The distance unit you want to use: mi or km.

methods.name: getLatitude
methods.description: Returns the latitude field of this location.

methods.name: getLongitude
methods.description: Returns the longitude field of this location.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.signature: public static Location newInstance(Decimal latitude, Decimal longitude)
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Location class, with the specified latitude and longitude.

description: Contains methods for accessing the component fields of geolocation compound fields.
